text: I just can't seem to decide.

It feels like I'm just standing there,
instead of striking a pose.

Do you think so...? I feel like it's already perfect,
but what could be missing...?
Hey, what do you think, Luca-chan?

... Just take a picture and see how it looks.
Use your smartphone...

But there's a difference between
looking in the mirror and taking a photo...

Yeah, yeah...! Then I'll take the picture~
Thank you, Luca-chan!
